name: The Last Existing Union
description:
It is a first-person parkour game prototype with grappling hook and world switching mechanics (like in Titanfall 2).

🎮 Features
  • Use wall-riding and jumping to traverse complex environments!
  • Switch between 2 worlds to overcome obstacles!
  • Use your charging grappling hook to cut paths!
  • Hook can be cut in the air to boost acceleration and perform advanced moves!
  • Beat other players' time scores!

Controls for keyboard and gamepad can be found in 'README' file in downloaded archive.

Ⓘ About

This game was developed by me as an university assignment for my first Unreal Engine course between Sep-Dec 2019.

For half a year I haven't touched this game, but I still have a will to continue work on that project and I think it could be worth to investing time for!

So I am looking for your feedback, should I return to this game making additional mechanics and production-ready levels?

♡ Thank you for playing (in advance :D) ♡
